Name: First(), Last(), Any()
Description: Helper methods to simplify development. Prevent common LINQ performance mistakes.
Author: Fons Sonnemans
Entries:
var l = new List<int> { 4, 12, 562, 1 };

Console.WriteLine(l.First()); // 4
Console.WriteLine(l.Last());  // 1
Console.WriteLine(l.Any());   // true
